description: Most people think that cocktails and shots are always made of strong liquor and make your face all red once you’ve taken a gulp. But there is also an array of&nbsp;sweet shots&nbsp;that deserve recognition. The buttery nipple shot or the “Cowboy” is one of them.With its rich sweet taste, buttery nipple shot is a famous party drink that reminds you of delicious and creamy butterscotch candy. It is traditionally layered while some like it shaken. Either way, it’s guaranteed to give you a great experience.
name: Buttery Nipple Shot

recipeInstructions.name: In a chilled shot glass, pour in the butterscotch schnapps.
